StockRoom

You only need to walk through the door to update your stock.
That is it. No Barcodes. No Scanning.

4. If you run a group practices, Stockroom can optimise your purchasing times and amounts to help cashflow and ensure you never run out of stock.
If you run a single practice, Stockroom can help drive down your prices by grouping orders in the back-end without you even realising.
